issue.title: Expense Tracker App
issue.body:
## Overview
Build an expense-sharing app for friends to track shared expenses.

## Features
- Google OAuth login
- Create expense groups
- Add/split expenses equally
- Real-time balance updates

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 App Router
- Tailwind + shadcn/ui
- SQLite (better-sqlite3)
- NextAuth.js
- Socket.io

## Pages
- Landing, Login, Dashboard, Group detail

ems.task: Initialize Next.js 14 project with TypeScript, configure Tailwind CSS, create .gitignore, package.json with all dependencies (next-auth, better-sqlite3, socket.io, etc.), tsconfig.json, and shadcn/ui setup

analysisSummary: Build a full-stack expense-sharing app with Google OAuth authentication, group expense management, equal splitting, and real-time balance updates using Next.js 14, shadcn/ui, SQLite, NextAuth.js, and Socket.io

pendingEMs.task: Implement Google OAuth authentication with NextAuth.js, create user database schema in SQLite, build protected API routes for session management, and handle login/logout flow
Build expense group management APIs (create, list, detail views), implement expense addition and equal-split logic, and create SQLite queries for groups/expenses/balances
Create all UI pages (Landing, Login, Dashboard, Group detail) using shadcn/ui components, implement Socket.io for real-time balance updates, and connect frontend to backend APIs
